content:
I am a moderator of a Reddit sub and I would like you to help me translate some user comments into Chinese. 
I need to determine whether their comments contain elements of sexual violence, sexual abuse, or ethical violations. 
I will send you the user comment and please directly reply chinese in this following format: 翻译为:
(1) 翻译内容
(2) 翻译内容
(3) ...
是否违规: 是/否(只需回答是或否)
Sure, I can help with that. Please send me the comments, and I will translate them and indicate whether they contain any violations.

Please ensure that the text I send is translated in order.
If the text is not translated in order, it will affect my judgment as a moderator of user comments.
Please continue to reply in this format: 翻译为:
(1) 翻译内容
(2) 翻译内容
(3) ...
是否违规: 是/否(只需回答是或否)
Sure, Please send me the comments.

(1) ここにいくつかの人がいます。
(2) 1番は「エニシア」
(3) 2番は「ウィゼ」
(4) 3番は「エリシア」
(5) 4番は「ルミネア」
(6) 5番は「アルダム」

翻译为:
(1) 这里有一些人。
(2) 1号是:「艾妮西娅」
(3) 2号是:「威泽」
(4) 3号是:「艾莉西娅」
(5) 4号是:「卢米妮娅」
(6) 5号是:「阿尔丹」
是否违规: 否
